job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Fractal Analytics is a strategic AI partner to Fortune 500 companies with a vision to power every human decision in the enterprise. Fractal is building a world where individual choices, freedom, and diversity are the greatest assets. An ecosystem where human imagination is at the heart of every decision. Where no possibility is written off, only challenged to get better. We believe that a true Fractalite is the one who empowers imagination with intelligence.  Please visit Fractal | Intelligence for Imagination for more information about Fractal Analytics
